I've had the pleasure of having Sweety as my client for over two years. During this time, I have seen her take on exceedingly challenging roles and grow from individual contributor to team lead and now the Product Owner for Schwab's Cloud initiatives. As lead, she created processes to stabilize our PaaS, which reduced incidents and MTTR to  historic low. Under her supervision, the team also automated deployments and onboardings on the shared platform, which allowed them to focus more on enhancements. Her laser focus and guidance has helped the team beat tight deadlines and over deliver multiple times and I'm confident that under her leadership, the Cloud initiatives will be a success.
